6.verification_summary: The claim that datapath fault injection results link SDC probabilities to data type and network topology, with shallower networks and larger dynamic range types yielding higher SDC rates, is plausible but not substantiated within the provided text and requires empirical validation beyond general background knowledge.

8.verification_summary: The claim aligns with general knowledge that flipping high order bits in floating point exponents causes large changes, while in fixed point the high order integer bits influence magnitude most; sensitivity scales with dynamic value range.
